Here is the elevator pitch for PREVENT-IA:

"Imagine a workplace where employees are empowered with the knowledge and skills to prevent accidents and ensure their own safety. PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform that makes this a reality. With its cutting-edge features and user-friendly interface, PREVENT-IA provides on-site Occupational Risk Prevention (ORP) training, tracks learning outcomes, and generates reports to help managers monitor and improve training. Unlike traditional training methods, PREVENT-IA offers personalized, dynamic, and activity-specific training that adapts to the needs of workers. By reducing the number of workplace accidents, PREVENT-IA helps companies save time, money, and lives. It's the perfect solution for managers, certification candidates, site managers, transporters, logistics, commissioning, and assembly professionals who want to prioritize workplace safety and well-being. With PREVENT-IA, you can rest assured that your employees are equipped with the knowledge and skills to prevent accidents and ensure their own safety."
